name: Knight's Quest (Maksymilian Lubas)
description:
Not many features currently this is the first version of the game. Updates coming... 

Controls:

esc -> close game

left mouse  -> attack

space  -> fire attack

WASD -> movement

1 -> use health potion

Objective:

Survive... break boxes for health potions, each new level = +max health and health refill, pick up gems for XP.

Please read credits and leave any comments for future improvements.
